casebody.data:
The CITY OF ASHEVILLE
v.
FROST 170A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 25, 2017 Robin T. Currin, City of Asheville Attorney, Sabrina Presnell Rockoff, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Kelly Whitlock, Associate City Attorney, John Bradford Maddux, Attorney at Law, for The City of Asheville. John C. Hunter, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Frost, Robert H.

*401The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of August 2017 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of August 2017."

Respondent shall have up to and including the September 21, 2017 to file and serve his/ her brief with this Court.
